QuestionDef.QInstructions: Please select all that apply:

QuestionDef.QText: Is this a SNAP grant application?

QuestionDef.QInstructions: Select one.
Select one.

QuestionDef.QText: Is there any recent correspondence requiring follow up?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If Yes, an explanation is required

QuestionDef.QText: Is there any restrictive term (on last award) requiring follow up?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If Yes, an explanation is required

QuestionDef.QText: Does the issuance of award require special documentation?
Is the research exempt, but not under E4?
Assurance status okay for all sites engaged in human subjects research?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If No, signed concurrence memo and special terms required for award.

QuestionDef.QText: Was the human subjects research identified as "indefinite"?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If Yes, special terms required for award.

QuestionDef.QText: Is the IRB approval date acceptable for award?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If No, signed concurrence memo and special terms required for award.

QuestionDef.QText: Is the skip year Financial Status Report (FSR) needed to issue the award?
Is the approved concurrence memo in file as required?
Are new supplemental funds included in this award?
Cummulative supplemental funds for competitive segment:
Funds approved in accordance with Levels of Authority?
Was the last award issued provisionally due to an unacceptable recruitment plan?
Is there a STOP notice for delinquent final reports in the file?
Has the Delinquent report been obtained?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If no, an explanation is required.

QuestionDef.QText: Has a change in scope been identified and approved by the Program Director?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: {If the change is not approved, or if there is no documentation, an explanation is required.

SelectionDef.Value: Change approved and documentation in file
Change approved and NO documentation in file

QuestionDef.QText: Is the assurance status o.k. for all sites engaged in animal research?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If no, signed concurrence memo and OLAW approval for award received

QuestionDef.QText: Has the live vertebrate animal research been identified as "indefinite"?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If no, signed concurrence memo and OLAW approval required for award to be issued

QuestionDef.QText: Is the IACUC verification acceptable for award?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If no, signed concurrence memo and OLAW approval required for award to be issued
If either "Other (Non End-of-Year)" or "Other End-of-Year" are selected, please select the "Comments" icon to provide an explanation.

QuestionDef.QText: Are there any name(s) on GSA Exclusion List?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: http://odoerdb2.od.nih.gov/gmac/topics/highrisk_main.html
Concurrence memo required for award to be issued

QuestionDef.QText: Are there any name(s) on the NEAR List?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: http://odoerdb2.od.nih.gov/gmac/topics/highrisk_main.html
Concurrence memo required for award to be issued

QuestionDef.QText: Are there any name(s) on the ORI Sanction List?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: http://odoerdb2.od.nih.gov/gmac/topics/highrisk_main.html
Concurrence memo required for award to be issued

QuestionDef.QText: Does this research involve Human Embryonic Stem Cells (hESC)?
hESC Lines entered/verified in IMPAC II?
Is this award over 5 Million Total Cost?
Certificate of Filing and Payment of Federal Taxes attached?
Are there any reports in the FCOI database?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: http://oerdb.od.nih.gov/cfdocs/compliance/fcoi/index_nih_staff.htm

QuestionDef.QText: Was the FCOI reported under the 1995 regulation?
Has the 2011 annual FCOI report been submitted and approved?
Has the Annual FCOI report been submitted and approved?

QuestionDef.QInstructions: (Select an icon to enter comments or attach a separate file)
